body: I bet Shinobu is even being paid off with those homemade donuts to keep an eye on Koyomi while they're attending college.

If Koyomi ever made a move I'm sure their friendship would end right their and she would go straight to Hitagi. And not teasing, I mean a serious move. Hitagi seems to be cool with his harem, as long as he stays 100% faithful. If not shed kill him and then her self

In the beginning I got the impression she was teasing Koyomi to test his faithfulness to Hitagi. 

After awhile once she saw Koyomi made Hitagi happy and he wasn't taking the bait she eased up and a true bro-ship was formed. It never goes past teasing, jokes and hanging out. Kanbaru might even be more lecherous than Koyomi and shes into girls so it's only natural they get along
I don't read the LN, but for me she looks more like bi than lesbian (she seem interested in Koyomi)
I'm just happy we got 2 monogatari series translations
Tfw there isn't single yuri hentai with Kanbaru even though she is lesbian

*Insertion insertion insertion insertion* 

I'm sorry, that just cracked me up.
